function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of organizational resilience may lead to decreased ability to absorb strain and adapt to adversity, increasing vulnerability to contagions.","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion spread within organizations and communities, leading to greater public health risks.","Mitigation":"Implementing organizational resilience strategies and training to enhance adaptability and agility in the face of disruptive events.","Technologies":"Enterprise resource planning (ERP) systems, crisis management software, and communication platforms for remote collaboration.","People":"Employees, management, and community members within and around the organization.","Owner":"Organizational leadership, risk managers, and public health officials."},{"Description":"Lack of social resilience may result in a community's inability to cope with external stresses and disturbances, making it more susceptible to contagion spread.","Impact":"Elevated risk of contagions affecting the well-being of individuals, communities, and environments, leading to public health crises.","Mitigation":"Building social resilience through community engagement, education, and capacity-building to enhance adaptive capacity and response to disruptions.","Technologies":"Community resilience mapping tools, social networking platforms for community collaboration, and crisis communication technologies.","People":"Community members, local leaders, and social service organizations.","Owner":"Local governing bodies, community organizers, and public health agencies."}]}
